sections.heading: Buildings; construction; violations; assumption of risk
sections.text: The continuance by any person in the employ of any such operator shall not be deemed an assumption of the risk of such employment.SourceLaws 1911, c. 65, ยง 11, p. 296;R.S.1913, ยง 3612;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. IV, art. IV, ยง 31, p. 567;C.S.1922,
